content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This Module is relevant for all EPAM employees, since anyone may need to find a vendor for EPAM, can become a requester/initiator of a new vendor creation, old vendor unblocking or updating of the existing one.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following training will help you become more familiar with the processes of managing vendors at EPAM.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In this section, we would like to introduce you to the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://bi.epam.com/Reports_PBI/powerbi/Asset Management/Procurement Management/Vendor catalog\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Active Vendor Database\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" that contains currently approved and active vendors for EPAM which have passed all internal reviews and controls. Using this database is beneficial for EPAM since it helps vendors’ Requesters/Initiators to save time and effort of requesting and qualifying a new vendor whenever they have a need – they can simply rely on this catalog of active EPAM's vendors that are already set up in the system. Maintaining and publishing the database of active approved vendors will help EPAM streamline and simplify the process of managing a large number of vendors, controlling and optimizing their costs, getting better deals and mitigating risks.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://bi.epam.com/Reports_PBI/powerbi/Asset Management/Procurement Management/Vendor catalog\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Active Vendor Database\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  (VPN is required)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We would like to pay attention of potential users of the database, that active approved vendors can be currently used by several different units and departments. In this connection, before starting cooperation with the vendor, we kindly ask you to communicate with the vendor’s initiator (or initiator’s manager) if one is mentioned in the catalog. The initiator can help with providing the vendor’s current contact, the valid agreement, terms of cooperation and possible discounts conditions. This action is also important for the appropriate vendor contract managing (through \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://contracts.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://contracts.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"), correct financial operation processing and proper reflection of their results, accurate financial accounting.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If there is no suitable vendor in the EPAM vendor database, to propose/create a new Vendor for EPAM in the system, initiator should submit the appropriate \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do?orderitem=caRecommendVendorSupplierSubcontractor\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Request 'Recommending Vendor'\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" on the EPAM Support Portal.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
